creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: torque, large chain with a coin on each end; after the coin on each side, the chain attaches to a large hollow fish; the fish is open-mouthed; each end of the fish has small chains with tiny spheres dangling down; bottom of fish has four chains dangling from it; each chain has a large curlicue as well as a hollow bell; bells have a symbol etched into them
dimension: 23 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1 in. (59.69 x 26.67 x 2.54 cm) (with chains dangling)
title: Torque
